original_text: The following came up from the towns of Tel Melah, Tel Harsha, Kerub, Addon and Immer, but they could not show that their families were descended from Israel:
korean_text: 델멜라와 델하르사와 그룹과 앗단과 임멜에서 올라온 자가 있으나 그들의 조상의 가문과 선조가 이스라엘에 속하였는지 밝힐 수 없었더라

sentences.original_text: from the towns of Tel Melah
Tel Harsha, Kerub, Addon and Immer
that their families were descended from Israel
